methods.name: mirror
javadoc: Returns the blockstate with the given mirror of the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.
@deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#withMirror(Mirror)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: rotate
javadoc: Returns the blockstate with the given rotation from the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.
@deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#withRotation(Rotation)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
